formalpara.title: Internal help for this function in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'DB' =-
[Syntax] DB(<family>/<key>)
[Synopsis] Read from or write to the Asterisk database
[Description] This function will read from or write a value to the Asterisk database. On a read, this function returns the corresponding value from the database, or blank if it does not exist. Reading a database value will also set the variable DB_RESULT. If you wish to find out if an entry exists, use the DB_EXISTS function.
